thread.section_title: AMOMA.com Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von AMOMA.com | www.amoma.com
thread.title: Rosie Taylor

author: Rosie Taylor
title: Rosie Taylor
text: Worst experience ever with a company. So far they have double charged me Â£1785 and refused to help out with refusing it- they keep blaming the bank! I used a travel credit card to pay initially and they declined the payment and asked me to pay via paypal. At the time they assured me that the pending transaction on the credit card wouldn't go through- and it has! Total criminals. Never use and this needs to be escalated because as far as I'm concerned this is fraud accepting the payment to get double the amount!
